overview:
Dave Deasy is a senior executive with 20+ years Marketing, E-Commerce, & General Management experience both as an entrepreneur and for big name brands like HP and AOL.

Dave has proven experience building high-impact teams and scalable operations to accelerate sales and support growth in SaaS (Zoomerang), software (Phoenix Technologies), business services (HP), and online (AOL Small Business and HP) markets. Dave has spent the past 10 years on the leading edge of e-commerce & online marketing helping to build / grow businesses in consumer (hpshopping), small business (AOL Small Business), and enterprise markets (HP and MarketTools). Dave has extensive hands-on experience with business / marketing strategy, market research, product management, marketing communications, go to market plans, online / offline advertising, SEO, social / viral marketing, telesales, and customer care. Dave has an MBA from Carnegie Mellonâ€™s Tepper School of Business and a BSME from the University of Pittsburgh.
